name: Clayton Contreras - Space Cowboy
description:
Clayton's ship got struck by a meteor while traveling through space, and now he's stuck in an unknown planet. Even though he doesn't have arms, all hope is not lost. Help Clayton Contreras find his way back home doing what he knows best: farming. Farm, explore, craft and defend your crops from the wilderness on this small fun adventure.

Controls:

  1. WASD: Movement
  2. Number Keys (1-5): Swap tool of your robo-arm
  3. Space: Sleep / Wake up
  4. LMB: Use active tool / Use Crafting Station
  5. RMB: Pick Up / Drop Items
  6. Esc: Pause / Close Menus

Basic Mechanics:

  1. Clear weeds and dead plants in order to gather seeds.
  2. Till the ground and keep it from drying up.
  3. Make sure to organize your crops and items, as Clayton doesn't have an inventory.
  4. Craft seeds, food and key items using the Crafting Station.
  5. Defend your crops at night, as wild Maus will appear and try to eat them.
  6. Balance your work and Energy by eating and sleeping.
  7. Gather enough resources in order to craft a Communication Device and win the game.

Feedback is welcome and very much appreciated!

This is a project for a university course.

Made by Diego Altamirano, Javier Mendoza and Josefina Onetto

Version beta 1.1.0
